decision_conditions:
Condition 2 of planning permission ref: P2020/2598/S73, dated 07/05/2021 shall now read as:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 
442 PA 001; 442 PA 002; 442 PA 003; 422 L 00; 6713/1202 Rev D; 6713/1203 Rev D; 6713/1204 Rev B; 6713/1206 Rev F; 6713/1302 Rev C; 6713/1303 Rev B; 6713/1304 Rev B; 6713/1305 Rev B; 6713/1218 Rev I; C100 Rev P1; DFCP 2141 TPP Rev A; 1520-01 Rev C; Statement of Consultation; eb7 Daylight and Sunlight Report 18/10/13; Planning Statement LBI-HCC-1301; Code for Sustainable Homes Pre-Assessment Report 25389(01); Energy Strategy Report 25389(01); Arboricultural Impact Assessment Revision A DFC P 2141; Design and Access Statement January 2014; Code for Sustainable Homes Calculation (BREglobal, 14/08/2020); Energy Calculation (Aspen, 28/09/2020); and Pre-Assessment (BREglobal, 14/08/2020); TX45 Log Periodic Aerial data sheet (Triax, 25/10/2021); 124360, Satellite data sheet (Triaz, 25/10/2021); Paving slab data sheet (TVAV installations, received 28/09/2021); Rubber matting data sheet (AK Rubber, received 28/09/2021); Roof mounts data sheet (received 28/09/2021); Fencing details (received 03/11/2021).

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
site_name:
Former The Laundry
21 Sparsholt Road 
London 
N19 4EL
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2020/2598/S73, dated 07/05/2021. The proposal seeks to position 8no. aerials to the roof and make amendments to the rear fencing.
